name: Steelcase Inc.
bossPosition: Sr VP, Chief Administrative Officer, General Counsel & Secretary
membership:
Member of the CE100 network of the Ellen MacArthur Foundation 
https://www.ellenmacarthurfoundation.org/our-work/activities/ce100
goal: Steelcase leads the way in creating great experiences by offering a range of architecture, furniture and technology products and services designed to help people reach their full potential. Steelcase comprehensive portfolio is anchored by eight core brands: Steelcase, Coalesse, Designtex, Turnstone, PolyVision, AMQ, Orangebox & Smith Systems. Together with its partners, Steelcase designs spaces to help people work, learn and heal. And because protecting the environment is in our DNA, we drive sustainable social, economic and environmental change through our decisions and actions. At Steelcase, we don’t just do what’s right, we do what’s best — for people and for the planet. Steelcase counts on 12,000 employees worldwide and a network of over 800 dealers.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Circular Economy Package,  Circular Economy Stakeholder Platform, EU Strategy for Plastics in the Circular Economy
